p: Intragenomic recombination in the multicopy opa genes is presumed to occur by RecA-mediated recombination ( 22). Genomic sequences were utilized to locate and derive specific primers for each opa gene. Four Opa-containing loci (termed opaA, opaB, opaD, and opaJ, herein) ( TableÂ 4) were found in every isolate, with multiple isolates having one or more identical Opa alleles (A. A. Al-Rubaiawi, unpublished data). Only one pair of opa loci in one isolate had undergone intragenomic recombination (A. A. Al-Rubaiawi, unpublished), while another had undergone gene conversion (V222) (A. A. Al-Rubaiawi, unpublished).
